data.title: Interview with Bernard Snoy et d’Oppuers (Ophain, 23 October 2015) — Excerpt: Wilfried Martens
meta_keywords: interview with bernard snoy et d’oppuers (ophain
data.meta_description: In this interview excerpt, Bernard Snoy et d’Oppuers, Head of the Private Office of Belgian Finance Minister Philippe Maystadt from 1988 to 1991, describes the personality of Wilfried Martens, Belgian Prime Minister from 1979 to 1981 and from 1981 to 1992 and President of the European People’s Party from 1990 to 2013.
data.text:
Source: Interview de Bernard Snoy et d’Oppuers / BERNARD SNOY ET D’OPPUERS, Elena Danescu, prise de vue : Alexandre Germain, prise de son: Nicolas Donnerup. - Ophain: CVCE [Prod.], 23.10.2015. CVCE, Sanem. - VIDEO (00:00:56, Couleur, Son original).
